author: jleroux
msg: When I wrote the new price rules screen I forgot about the dynamic aspect in the condition edit section, I found it by chance today.

This fixes it: you can now swap the INPUT type from a list type (drop-down for the value) to a input value type (like quantity or list price) or vice versa. The last input value is kept in the background, we could resetting the value to null, but I think it makes sense because with the value still in the background it's easy to get back to the original value if you change your mind (or in case of error).
